channel.title: Luzox-pvp 718/742
channel.description:
hey guys and welcom to the awsome Server called luzox-pvp.
Information:
all working auras including supreme's eco base eco pricing flaming skulls specs for all items the should have Squeal of fortune Owners which care about every single Player and listen to them.
Features: - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands - Storm of Armadyl,- Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour doesn't Degrade - Auras are all complete - possible to Switch ingame name - every single skill works
Bosses: - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - 100% Godwars with new drops - Corporeal beast with all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows
Pvp/PK/PVM - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Very good switching - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
Awsome home:
http://gyazo.com/6a6eb8ebe9ee2d42da1548d5065344e2
clue scrolls with everything like real rs:
http://gyazo.com/3ffb4160a664dbc551c7ff67f4796b2a
Fight Kiln with all Waves:
http://gyazo.com/1e7c843c0ee680c454ea1a4cfcb70379
Loyalty Points Shop:
http://gyazo.com/7ed3229a1f29676c7d2bd45fd4327d30
Nex wth all 4 waves:
http://gyazo.com/07a0f2bb44167f434ac7eb26388ecd6a
We Need as many Players as we can get so pls try it out at :
http://luzox-pvp.ipbhost.com/
